operations with wiso collections
[isoline for approximation (wiso)]


Functions

bool surfit::wisos_delall ()
 removes all isolines with weight from surfit_wisos collection
bool surfit::wisos_del (int pos)
 removes isoline with weight from surfit_wisos collection at 'pos' position

 reads isoline with weight from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_wisos collection
bool surfit::wisos_load (const char *filename, const char *wisoname=NULL)
 reads isoline with weight from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_wisos collection
wiso * surfit::wisos_at (int pos)
 returns wiso at 'pos' position in surfit_wisos collection
wiso * surfit::wisos_first ()
 returns first wiso in surfit_wisos collection
wiso * surfit::wisos_last ()
 returns last wiso in surfit_wisos collection
int surfit::wisos_size ()
 returns amount of elements in surfit_wisos collection
